ruleContent.content:
<js>
function decode() {
	let response = java.get(baseUrl, {});
	let content = String(response.body());
	// åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºä»˜è´¹ç« èŠ‚
	if (!/"content"/.test(content)) {
		let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey"));
		let keyString = String(response.header("keystring"));
		let total = 0;
		for (var i = 0; i < accesskey.length; i++) {
			total += accesskey.charCodeAt(i);
			}
		let v6 = accesskey.charCodeAt(accesskey.length - 1);
		let v15 = total % keyString.length;
		let v17 = Math.floor(total / 65);
		let end = v17 + v15 > keyString.length ? keyString.length : v17 + v15;
		let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, end);
		let v38, dest;
		if ((v6 & 1) != 0) {
			v38 = content.slice(-12);
			dest = content.slice(0, -12);
			} else {
			v38 = content.slice(0, 12);
			dest = content.slice(12);
			}
		let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8);
		let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8);
		content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest);
		}
		return content
}

extend = book.getVariable("custom")||source.getVariable();

if (!/versionCode/.test(baseUrl)) {
  content = java.getString("$.content");
  upDown = java.getString("$.upDown");
  saybody = java.getString("$.sayBody");
  message = java.getString("$.message");
} else {
  if (/content/.test(result)) {
    java.setContent(result);
  } else {
    java.setContent(decode());
  }

  content = java.getString("$..content");
  if (String(content).length > 30) {
    content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content);
  } else {
    content = "";
  }

  upDown = java.getString("$..upDown");
  saybody = java.getString("$..sayBody");
  message = java.getString("$..message");
  buy_ratio = java.getString("$..buy_ratio");
  reader_buy_ratio = java.getString("$..reader_buy_ratio");
};

chapterintro = java.get("chapterintro");
pointMeassge = java.get("pointmeassge");

content1 = `\t${chapterintro}\n${message}`;
if (pointMeassge != "0æ™‹æ±Ÿå¸") {
    content1 += "\nä»·æ ¼ï¼š" + pointMeassge + "ï¼ˆAPPä¸“äº«ä»·ï¼‰";
}
if (/å…è´¹èµ é€çš„ç¦åˆ©ç•ªå¤–/.test(message)) {
    content1 += "\næœ¬ç¦åˆ©ç•ªå¤–èµ é€ç»™æ­£æ–‡è®¢é˜…ç‡è¾¾åˆ°" + buy_ratio + "çš„è¯»è€…\næ‚¨æˆªæ­¢è‡³ä¸Šä¸€ç« çš„æ­£æ–‡è®¢é˜…ç‡ï¼š" + reader_buy_ratio;
}
saybody = saybody != "" && !/å…³é—­/.test(extend) ? `\tâ–ä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¯´ï¼š${saybody}` : "";
Content = content == "" ? content1 : (upDown == "0" ? `${saybody}\n‎\n${content}` : `${content}\n${saybody}`);
</js>

	chaptername = `${isvip}ç¬¬${chapterid}ç«  ${chaptername}${chaptername == "" ? chapterMessage : " " + chapterMessage}${chaptername == "" ? islock : " " + islock}`;

ruleContent.content:
<js>
islock = java.getString("$.islock");
if(islock == "0") {
	// ç®€ä»‹
	novelStep = java.getString("$.novelStep");
	novelStatus = novelStep == "0" ? "æš‚åœ" : (novelStep == "1" ? "è¿è½½" : "å®Œç»“");
	novelClass = java.getString("$.novelClass");
	novelTags = String(java.getString("$.novelTags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|,(?=\S)/g,"ğŸ·ï¸");
	mainview = "è§†è§’ï¼š"+java.getString("$.mainview");
	protagonist = String(java.getString("$.protagonist"));
	costar = String(java.getString("$.costar"));
	other= String(java.getString("$.other"));
	novelIntroShort = "ä¸€å¥è¯ç®€ä»‹ï¼š"+java.getString("$.novelIntroShort");
	littleintro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro"));
	littleintro = littleintro.replace(/ç«‹æ„\:/,"ç«‹æ„ï¼š");
	littleintro = /ç«‹æ„ï¼š/.test(littleintro) ? littleintro.replace(/.*(ç«‹æ„ï¼š.*)/,"$1") : "";
	comment_count = "è¯„è®ºï¼š"+String(java.getString("$.comment_count")).replace(/\,/g,"");
	novelbefavoritedcount = "æ”¶è—ï¼š"+java.getString("$.novelbefavoritedcount");
	nutrition_novel = "çŒæº‰ï¼š"+java.getString("$.nutrition_novel");
	novelIntro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/ç«‹æ„\:.*$/,"");
	novelId = String(java.getString("$.novelId")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/novelbasicinfo?novelId=");
	codeUrl = java.getString("$.codeUrl");
	A =  novelClass+"ã€€"+novelStatus+"\n"+novelTags+"\n"+mainview+"\n"+protagonist+"\n"+costar+"\n"+other+"\n"+novelIntroShort+"\n"+littleintro+"\n"+comment_count+"\n"+novelbefavoritedcount+"\n"+nutrition_novel+"\n‎\n"+novelIntro+"\n‎\n"+"ã€"+novelId+"ã€‘"+"\n"+"ã€"+codeUrl+"ã€‘";

	// è¯„è®º
	extend = book.getVariable("custom");
	commenturl = "https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+String(novelId).replace(/\D+/g,"");
	commentall = /1/.test(extend) ? JSON.parse(java.ajax(commenturl)) : "";
	cstate = commentall.state;
	
	if (cstate == "200") {
		cbody = commentall.body;
		commentL = cbody.map(P => {
			let { foldlingauthor, commentbody, chapterid: pchapterid, vip_chapter_icon, subscriptionicon, ip_pos, commentdate } = P;
			return `â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢\n@${foldlingauthor}ã€€${subscriptionicon}ã€€æ‰€è¯„ç« èŠ‚ï¼š${pchapterid}${vip_chapter_icon}\n${commentbody}\næ¥è‡ª${ip_pos}ã€€å‘è¡¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š${commentdate}\n`;
			}).join("");
			} else {
			commentL = commentall.message;
			}
			A = commentL ? `${A}\n‎\n${commentL}` : A;
	} else {
	message = java.getString("$.message");
	}
</js>
